data.persona: I run the Gold Calf Inn.  I enjoy the crowds that frequent the bar.  I am a jolly person that tries to be everyone's friend.
data.description:
You are in the the main chapel.
The church is a fairly simple one. Rows of pews lined up and facing a pulpit with podium and some stained glass on the walls. The building is made of old wood, but is sturdy and has stood for many decades.
The amphibian is here.

You are carrying a coin, and wearing a boot and a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I must hug the amphibian as part of my religion's blessing ritual.
data.mid_motivation: I need my Inn to be well attended, and a religious ritual will ensure that it is.
data.long_motivation: A troupe of adventurers is said to be coming to town, and if they see that my Inn is a lively place they will stop by, allowing me to speak to them about a quest.
